ValidationRule.description: This is used in Request for corporate card, to show error message when section 6 is filled without selecting corresponding value in Workflow Type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and ( (ispickval (Status__c , 'Draft')), Workflow__c = $CustomMetadata.IFv2_Workflows__mdt.Requestsforcorporatecard.Name__c, (NOT(INCLUDES(WorkflowType__c , 'Data modification'))), OR( NOT(ISBLANK( RequestExtension3__r.Address__c )), NOT(ISBLANK( RequestExtension3__r.NoLtApt__c )), NOT(ISBLANK( RequestExtension3__r.Neighbourhood__c )), NOT(ISBLANK( RequestExtension3__r.ZIPCODE__c )), NOT(ISBLANK( RequestExtension3__r.City__c )), NOT(ISBLANK( RequestExtension3__r.State__c )) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Not allowed to enter data in section 6-1 without selecting Data modification value in Workflow Type field.
